item.title: Introduction to Interferometry
item.description: Radio interferometry often comes off as a difficult concept, but it doesnâ€™t need to be that way. In this blog post, I will attempt to give a more intuitive introduction to radio interferometry, one that, in particular, might help a budding radio engineer learn more about this fascinating field.
